name: koishi-plugin-proxy
description: enables you to forward an http request to another HTTP server. Supported protocols: HTTP, HTTPS, HTTP2

description.zh: 🚀 转发 HTTP 请求到另一个 HTTP 服务器。支持的协议: HTTP, HTTPS, HTTP2
description.en: 🚀 enables you to forward an http request to another HTTP server. Supported protocols: HTTP, HTTPS, HTTP2
